text: Axel Neumann (born 22 April 1952) is a German retired professional footballer who played professionally in the North American Soccer League. Neumann began his career with Tennis Borussia Berlin. In 1975, he moved to the United States and signed with the Boston Minutemen of the North American Soccer League. In 1977, he began the season with Team Hawaii. On July 8, 1977, he moved to the Las Vegas Quicksilvers.Rowdies ==References== ==External links== * NASL career stats Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Berlin Category:Boston Minutemen players Category:California Surf players Category:German footballers Category:German expatriate footballers Category:Las Vegas Quicksilver players Category:North American Soccer League (1968–1984) players Category:San Diego Sockers (NASL) players Category:Team Hawaii players Category:Tennis Borussia Berlin players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Axel Neumann
